attributes.action: Ban petitions as this Government doesn't seem to give a stuff.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to see E-Petitions to 10 Downing Street banned, as there is little or no evidence of this Government taking any action as a result, despite huge support for particular petitions such as duty on fuel for example. How many working days have been lost by our economy as people take time to fill in pointless E-petitions in the vain hope the Government will react ? Stop this now !

PS - Signatures from 'Elvis', 'Hitler' and other deceased historical figures particularly welcome.

rejection.details: Please send comments on e-petitions to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
